title:SpaceMonkey's Weapon Guide - Dawning 2025
description:https://docs.google.com/document/d/1KGxePntz2loCYlAhdKm0fJyyf_YURJ1Zd7L1smsu4-c/edit?usp=sharing

// Permafrost (Season 28)
//notes:SpaceMonkey (PvE / God-PvE): "This is about two or three years too late. A great looking add clear and utility GL, held back by the fact that area denial frames exist and invalidate this thing's entire purpose. Honestly, this still ticks a lot of boxes for me personally, so I'll be going for one in the hopes that the archetype can make a comeback." Recommended MW: Reload, Blast Radius.|tags:pve,god-pve
dimwishlist:item=2316331767&perks=1478423395,2822142346,243981275,2922950962
dimwishlist:item=2316331767&perks=1478423395,2822142346,1955165503,2922950962
dimwishlist:item=2316331767&perks=1844523823,2822142346,243981275,2922950962
dimwishlist:item=2316331767&perks=1844523823,2822142346,1955165503,2922950962

// Permafrost (Season 28)
//notes:SpaceMonkey (PvE / God-PvE): "This is about two or three years too late. A great looking add clear and utility GL, held back by the fact that area denial frames exist and invalidate this thing's entire purpose. Honestly, this still ticks a lot of boxes for me personally, so I'll be going for one in the hopes that the archetype can make a comeback." Recommended MW: Reload, Blast Radius.|tags:pve,god-pve
dimwishlist:item=2922964484&perks=1478423395,2822142346,243981275,2922950962
dimwishlist:item=2922964484&perks=1478423395,2822142346,1955165503,2922950962

dimwishlist:item=2922964484&perks=1844523823,2822142346,1955165503,2922950962

// Permafrost (Season 28)
//notes:SpaceMonkey (PvE): "This is about two or three years too late. A great looking add clear and utility GL, held back by the fact that area denial frames exist and invalidate this thing's entire purpose. Honestly, this still ticks a lot of boxes for me personally, so I'll be going for one in the hopes that the archetype can make a comeback." Recommended MW: Reload, Blast Radius.|tags:pve

// Permafrost (Season 28)
//notes:SpaceMonkey (PvE): "This is about two or three years too late. A great looking add clear and utility GL, held back by the fact that area denial frames exist and invalidate this thing's entire purpose. Honestly, this still ticks a lot of boxes for me personally, so I'll be going for one in the hopes that the archetype can make a comeback." Recommended MW: Reload, Blast Radius.|tags:pve

// Fimbulwinter Stitch (Season 28)
//notes:SpaceMonkey (PvE / God-PvE): "Terrible archetype and worst-in-class ammo gen stat. Pretty disappointing but is still a totally serviceable sidearm for arc enthusiasts." Recommended MW: Reload.|tags:pve,god-pve

// Mistral Lift (Season 28)
//notes:SpaceMonkey (PvE / God-PvE): "LFRs are pretty terrible right now, but if they were to come back into meta this is a legitimate contender with Scintillation as the most viable option. The utility potential of having withering gaze in the first column paired with a damage perk is honestly pretty intriguing." Recommended MW: Charge Time.|tags:pve,god-pve
dimwishlist:item=766122634&perks=839105230,2680121939,3987942396,3078487919

// Mistral Lift (Season 28)
//notes:SpaceMonkey (PvE / God-PvE): "LFRs are pretty terrible right now, but if they were to come back into meta this is a legitimate contender with Scintillation as the most viable option. dimwishlist:item=270610849&perks=839105230,2680121939,3987942396,3078487919

The utility potential of having withering gaze in the first column paired with a damage perk is honestly pretty intriguing." Recommended MW: Charge Time, Reload, Handling.|tags:pve
